video:video.video:title: Ask The Gu
video:video.video:description: As a special offering for the viewing audience at home, 30 minutes after Scott Guthrie walked off the stage, he came back for a live, intimate, online-only video chat with Jeff Atwood&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Day One Keynote
video:video.video:description: Day 1 keynote featuring Bill Buxton and Scott Guthrie.

video:video.video:title: Day Two Keynote
video:video.video:description: Day 2 keynote featuring Dean Hachamovitch and Deborah Adler.

video:video.video:title: Using the Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio to Build Cloud Services
video:video.video:description: Come hear how to use the Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio to more easily create, build, debug, deploy, run and package scalable services on Windows Azure.

video:video.video:title: Standards for Aggregating Activity Feeds and Social Aggregation Services

video:video.video:title: Going Inside Microsoft Silverlight: Exploring the Core CLR
video:video.video:description: See how the CLR team slimmed down the size of the runtime into a small, zippy download, the Core CLR, yet kept the experience .NET developers have come to love.

video:video.video:title: Connecting Applications across Networks with Microsoft .NET Services

video:video.video:title: File|New -> Company: Creating NerdDinner.com with Microsoft ASP.NET Model View Controller (MVC)
video:video.video:description: No slides. Just code. Start with File|New and build a real Web site with ASP.NET, ASP.NET AJAX, Authentication, Authorization, MVC, Microsoft SQL Server and jQuery in sixty-five minutes or less.

video:video.video:title: Using Dynamic Languages to Develop Microsoft Silverlight Applications
video:video.video:description: Learn how to use the Microsoft Visual Basic/C# DLR integration to test a statically-typed application with IronRuby. See how to develop a Silverlight application end-to-end with IronRuby, and how&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Improving Mobile Experiences with the Microsoft Mobile Device Browser File
video:video.video:description: Learn how to make industry leading mobile Web sites using the newly-released open and free device information service from Microsoft. Hear how to better detect the mobile handsets viewing your site&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Way of the Whiteboard: Persuading with Pictures
video:video.video:description: Hear Dan Roam talk about persuading people with pictures. Whether convincing leadership to back a project, getting a VC to fund a business, building consensus on a project team, or selling a new&#8230;
